data.prayer: Father, your Word can be a lamp to the feet of the 351,462 people in the state of Bujumbura Rural who claim to know you, if they open it and read it today.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp to my feet and a light to my path.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Bujumbura Rural, Burundi
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Jesus, your return is closer than when we first believed. Please, set urgency in the hearts of the people living in the state of Bujumbura Rural.
data.verse: Besides this you know the time, that the hour has come for you to wake from sleep. For salvation is nearer to us now than when we first believed.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 3 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, fill the 167,703 believers in the state of Bujumbura Rural with tears, because God is not obeyed by those around them.
data.verse: Streams of tears flow from my eyes, for your law is not obeyed.

data.prayer: Father, comfort those who mourn in Bujumbura Rural, Burundi.
data.verse: Blessed are those who mourn, for they will be comforted.

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Swahili people.
Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Bujumbura Rural, Burundi to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Bujumbura Rural, Burundi.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.section_summary:
the state of Bujumbura Rural, Burundi has a population of 555,900.

We estimate Bujumbura Rural has 167,703 people who might know Jesus, 351,462 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 36,735 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 3 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, make the 167,703 believers in Bujumbura Rural to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 388,197 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.
